actions.title: Â» Rhino Help Menu | Useful Module
actions.name: Create Embed Message

actions.message:
Here are the useful commands.

`userinfo {user}` - Information about a user.
`serverinfo` - Information about the server.
`embed` - Embeds text.
`time` - Wonder what time it is...
`randomnum` - Generate some random stuff
`randompass` - Random password. 
`bitcoin` - Bitcoin prices.
`poll` - Make a poll <3.
actions.name: Set Embed Description
